oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-11-15 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 15, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Hank Garland, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 997th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Jimmy C. Newman; Jordanaires; Grandpa Jones; Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Hank Snow, Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Hank Snow introduces Jimmy Newman -- Outside Your Door (Jimmy C. Newman, Jordanaires) -- Hank Snow introduces Grandpa Jones -- Daylight Savings Time (Grandpa Jones) -- Hank Snow talks -- My Mother (Hank Snow, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Snow, Hank; Newman, Jimmy C.
